column2: Apple's earnings report will reveal how the consumer-electronics giant is managing supply-chain and macroeconomic pressures, but more important for Wall Street will be the annual update on its capital-return plans.
column4: Apple gave investors more than $100 billion last year — how much more is coming?

column2: Tesla earnings surged and the EV giant is reopening its Shanghai plant, but BYD seems set to grab the EV crown.
column4: Tesla Stock Vs. BYD Stock: Tesla Earnings Boom, But BYD Set To Seize EV Crown
